string.name: SKUnsafeHotkey
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with standard keyboard use

string.name: SKHotkeyConflicts_Keyboard
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another keyboard

resources.string: Hotkey %1$s ni ata ngkatǝ hotkey natǝ mdǝ cara na ar keyboard %2$s. Ma ǝ lǝkǝma, hotkey na ar keyboard %2$s ata cijimtadzi. Lǝkǝma\?

string.name: SKHotkeyConflicts_Interface
string.comment: Hotkey dialog - warning of hotkey conflict with hotkey for another interface hotkey

resources.string: Hotkey %1$s ni ata ngkatǝ hotkey na damwa. Magǝ lǝkǝma, hotkey na palani ata cijimtadzi. Lǝkǝma\?

string.name: SKApplicationTitle
string.comment: Product name used for the title of message boxes and message dialogs

string.name: SKSplashVersion
string.comment: Version number

string.name: SKButtonPrint
string.comment: Print button in Welcome dialog for keyboards

string.name: SKPackageAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during package installation that a package with the same name is already installed.

resources.string: Mdǝku kurtǝ ka hara instal ar package naka thlǝmari %1$s ni. Ga ata bara kara kǝlɓǝlani ni tǝng ga ata hara instal na bǝlin na ni ya\?

string.name: SKKeyboardAlreadyInstalled
string.comment: Notice during keyboard layout installation that a keyboard layout with the same name is already installed.

resources.string: Mdǝ ku kurtǝ ka hara instal ar keyboard naka thlǝmari %1$s ni. Magǝ lǝkǝma, ata kǝlɓǝla ni kwapu na bǝlin ni wutǝ ka mdǝ hara instal ni. Lǝkǝma\?

string.name: SKKeyboardPartOfPackage
string.comment: Notice of need to uninstall an entire package

resources.string: Keyboard \'%1$s\' akwa kuta package \'%2$s\'. Doli sai magǝ kǝlɓǝla shanga package ni. Lǝkǝma\?

string.name: SKInstallLanguageTransientLimit
string.comment: Message shown when Keyman is unable to install a Windows language for a keyboard

resources.string: Aɗi wuta ka hara instal ar hulfur mnya na ar keyboard wa; Windows ka tǝng hulfur mnyayeri da 4 natǝ mda atsoktǝ hara alada custom \'transient\', antǝ nughum gǝ kurtǝ ka mzhitǝ hangkur ngǝni.

string.name: SKPackageDoesNotIncludeWelcome
string.comment: Notice of lack of introductory help

resources.string: Package wala keyboard \'%1$s\' aɗika dlara laga na ar baɗita wa.

string.name: SKOSNotSupported
string.comment: Notice of unsupported operating system

resources.string: Operating system ngǝni aɗena kǝɓzdzi wa.

string.name: SKOnlineHelpFile
string.comment: File name of the help file - must be .chm format. The locale folder will be checked first for the file

string.name: SKCouldNotFindHelp
string.comment: Notice of help file not found

resources.string: Mda aɗi tsoktǝ wutǝ fayil ar dlara wa.

string.name: SKANSIEncoding
string.comment: Keyboard with an ANSI or Codepage encoding

string.name: SKUnicodeEncoding
string.comment: Keyboard with a Unicode encoding

string.name: SKDownloadProgress_Title
string.comment: Notice of file downloading

string.name: SKUninstallOnScreenKeyboard
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall OSK for a keyboard layout

resources.string: Gǝ tamata abbǝr ga ata bara kara kǝlɓula on screen keyboard ngǝni natǝ mdǝ hara instal aka %1$s\ ya?

string.name: SKUninstallKeyboard
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall keyboard layout

resources.string: Gǝ tamata abbǝr ga ata bara kara kǝlɓǝla keyboard ngǝni ya%1$s\?

string.name: SKUninstallPackage
string.comment: Request for confirmation to uninstall a package

resources.string: Gǝ tamata abbǝr ga ata bara kara kǝlɓǝla package ngǝni ya %1$s\?\n\n%2$s

string.name: SKUninstallPackageFonts
string.comment: Text embedded in SKUninstallPackage when fonts are ready for uninstall.

resources.string: Mda ata kǝlɓǝla jili rubutuyeri ngǝni tsuwa: %1$s.

string.name: SKUnicodeData_Build
string.comment: Request to build Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: Mapu na ar character ni tsaka database na ar characteryeri natǝ ata bara ka mdǝ hara build ni kwapu ka mdǝ wutǝ hara kǝthlǝr katsa. Hara build ni kulini ya\?

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseCouldNotBeDeleted
string.comment: Error deleting Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: Mda aɗa wuta ka mdǝ cijimta character na ar Unicode na ar database kamnyar hara rebuild ni wa. Suayeri naka dametǝdzi ni da an: %1$s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_CouldNotCreateDatabase
string.comment: Error creating Unicode Character Map database

resources.string: Mda aɗa wuta ka mdǝ hǝnɓǝla character na ar Unicode database wa antǝ mdǝ ngkatǝni hara kǝthlǝr. Suayeri naka dametǝdzi ni da an: %1$s

string.name: SKUnicodeData_DatabaseLoadFailedRebuild
string.comment: Error loading Unicode Character Map database. Request to rebuild.

resources.string: Character na Unicode database aɗi wutǝ ka hara lodi kalkal wa (%1$s). Hara rebuild ni kulini ya\?

string.name: SKCannotStartProduct
string.comment: Error from Keyman failing to start keyman.exe due to an access denied or file not found

resources.string:
Keyman ku ngǝlari ta kǝlardzi. Usa kara wulhǝ setiyeri ar nga na ar sǝkuriti kamnyar kara tamata progǝram na ar Keyman.exe ku wutǝ kǝlardzi kwapu lǝkǝma. Dametǝdzi natǝ ku kalaktǝdzi an:

"%1$s"

Ga ata bara kara jaktǝ ngkǝrtǝ kǝlar Keyman ka damwa kulini ya\?

string.name: SKDebuggingWarning
string.comment: Warning upon starting debugging in the Options tab

resources.string:
Mda ata ɗuwa labar na ar debug na ar Keyman akwa log fauil natǝ mda ana kǝgani %LOCALAPPDATA%\Keyman\Diag\system#.etl (natǝ # lamba laga). Kara lǝɓǝla akwa Keyman kwapu gǝ ngkǝrtǝ cijimta fayil ngǝni.

NDƏKƏR THLƏM: Fayil ngǝni ata mbiku ka nzi ola akwa kuta saka rakka. Nam debugging ka tsa haraata tsoktǝ vu ka system ni aɗi kǝthlǝr ka huva wa antǝ ka mdǝ hara ngǝni tǝng sai ka dlara na ar mallǝm na sǝndǝ suni ɓɗaku.

NƏKƏR THLƏM ATAR SU NA ASHIR: Kara sǝnda abbǝr wa fayil na ar debug ata sǝnda ka kǝtǝ shanga suayeri natǝgǝ ntsari saka tǝ ga akwa hara taipin. Kara kǝlar dubu tǝng sai saka tǝ ga akwa hara debugging wala saka tǝ ga akwa namɓǝla suayeri.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_PleaseWait
string.comment: OSK Font helper message

resources.string: Usa kara sǝkta sakatǝ akwa pakɓǝla jili rubutuyeri na kǝɓa kari keyboard %1$s

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NonUnicode
string.comment: OSK Font helper non-Unicode keyboard

resources.string: Keyboard %1$s aɗi keyboard ar Unicode wa. Jili rubutuyeri aɗa tsoktǝ wutǝdzi wa ka kǝrni. Usa wulhǝ kakaɗuyeri na ar keyboard na ar labar ar jili rubutuyeri.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_NoKeyboards
string.comment: OSK Font helper no keyboards

resources.string: Aɗiwa keyboard layoutyeri natǝ mdǝ hara instal ɗa wala lodi ɗa kulini wa.

string.name: S_OSK_FontHelper_ChooseKeyboard
string.comment: OSK Font helper choose keyboard

resources.string: Usa kara carɓǝla keyboard na ar Keyman kamnyar wutǝ jili rubutuyeri na kǝɓa kari.

string.name: SKTextEditorCaption
string.comment: Caption of Text Editor
